name: upload-files-server
description: 1. Create **web site** with NodeJS in which you can **upload files**. 	* You should have the option to upload a file and be given an unique URL for its **download**. 	* Use **GUID for file urls** (e.g. `/file/797ff043-11eb-11e1-80d6-510998755d10.mp3`) 	* You are **not allowed to use ExpressJS**

scripts.start: mkdir files && mkdir downloads && node file-upload-server.js
